This week I traveled to Buffalo New York along Lake Erie were the sky was cloaked in a constant gray missed allowing for just occasional peaks of the colorful leaves
The forecasts was calling for the first snow fall of the year but for the good people of buffalo that's not even cause to wear a long sleeve shirt
When you live in Buffalo complaining about the weather is complaining about life itself
I was picked up at the airport by a woman named Charlie she's been driving for twenty two years and their cabinets filled with stuffed animals they line the dashboard hung from the rear view mirror and the monkey was attached to the steering wheel
These are my co pilot she said some people have Jesus I have these guys she goes by Charlie because her father was hoping she'd be a boy I really think the name made me a bit of a tomboy when I was younger
They don't say tomboy anymore now everybody is filled with gender fluids
I guess I was ahead of my time but anyway I'm all girl now and everyone still calls me Charlie
